changes.description: Add abyssal preview tooltip with pricing on hover
Add live API integration with contract detail modal
Generate EEA-xxxxxx reference codes for quotes
Add station-level sell to buyback in tree tab
Add cross-tab sell to buyback with region validation
Add row selection and copy to assets and tree tabs
Add fitted rigs column to upwell structure table
Ensure Jita refresh triggers on init when stale
Handle null contract items and add AT ships pricing
Correct pricing for abyssals and capital ships
Improve hover tooltip with debounce and in-game styling
Unify maximize behavior for button and double-click
Add IndexedDB corruption recovery and prevention
Consolidate all pricing through centralized price store
Centralize init via registry and fix race conditions
